name: SK Professional Design System
description: Design system sombre et professionnel avec accent vert

container.style: { minHeight: '100vh', background: '#0F0F12', fontFamily: 'Inter, system-ui, sans-serif', color: '#FFFFFF', padding: '24px' }

header.style: { position: 'sticky', top: 0, zIndex: 50, background: 'rgba(15, 15, 18, 0.8)', backdropFilter: 'blur(16px)', borderBottom: '1px solid #2E2E36', padding: '12px 24px' }

card.style: { background: '#16161A', borderRadius: '16px', padding: '24px', border: '1px solid #2E2E36', boxShadow: '0 4px 24px -4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4)' }

kpiCard.style: { background: '#16161A', borderRadius: '16px', padding: '20px', border: '1px solid #2E2E36', transition: 'all 0.3s ease' }
kpiCard.changePositive: { display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: '4px', fontSize: '12px', color: '#34D399', marginTop: '8px' }
kpiCard.changeNegative: { display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: '4px', fontSize: '12px', color: '#EF4444', marginTop: '8px' }

button.primary: { background: '#00765F', color: 'white', padding: '10px 20px', borderRadius: '8px', border: 'none', fontWeight: '500', fontSize: '14px', cursor: 'pointer', transition: 'all 0.2s ease' }
button.secondary: { background: '#232329', color: '#A1A1AA', padding: '8px 16px', borderRadius: '8px', border: '1px solid #2E2E36', fontWeight: '500', fontSize: '12px', cursor: 'pointer', transition: 'all 0.2s ease' }
button.ghost: { background: 'transparent', color: '#71717A', padding: '8px', borderRadius: '8px', border: 'none', cursor: 'pointer', transition: 'all 0.2s ease' }

input.style: { width: '100%', padding: '10px 14px', background: '#1C1C21', border: '1px solid #2E2E36', borderRadius: '8px', color: '#FFFFFF', fontSize: '14px', outline: 'none', transition: 'all 0.2s ease' }

select.style: { width: '100%', padding: '10px 14px', background: '#1C1C21', border: '1px solid #2E2E36', borderRadius: '8px', color: '#FFFFFF', fontSize: '12px', cursor: 'pointer' }

badge.default: { display: 'inline-flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: '4px', padding: '4px 10px', background: '#232329', borderRadius: '6px', fontSize: '10px', fontWeight: '500', color: '#A1A1AA' }

table.headerCell: { fontSize: '10px', fontWeight: '600', textTransform: 'uppercase', letterSpacing: '0.05em', color: '#71717A', textAlign: 'left' }

nav.container: { display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: '4px', background: 'rgba(35, 35, 41, 0.5)', borderRadius: '8px', padding: '4px' }
nav.item: { display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', gap: '6px', padding: '8px 12px', borderRadius: '6px', fontSize: '12px', fontWeight: '500', color: '#A1A1AA', cursor: 'pointer', transition: 'all 0.2s ease' }

iconBox.style: { width: '40px', height: '40px', borderRadius: '12px', display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', justifyContent: 'center', background: 'rgba(0, 118, 95, 0.1)', color: '#00765F', transition: 'transform 0.3s ease' }
